title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

sample: 98 mol %;0.22 water mass %;0.02 halide impurity mass %(dried by vacuum heating)
components.name: 1-methyl-3-(9Z,12Z)-9,12-octadecadien-1-yl-1H-imidazolium 1,1,1-trifluoro-N-[(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl]methanesulfonamide

ref.full: Murray, S. M.; Zimlich, T. K.; Mirjafari, A.; O'Brien, R. A.; Davis Jr., J. H.; West, K. N. (2013) J. Chem. Eng. Data 58(6), 1516-1522.
ref.title: Thermophysical Properties of Imidazolium-Based Lipidic Ionic Liquids
